name.value: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description.value: The data item indicates whether TNM classification is performed during or following multimodality therapy (neoadjuvant radio- and/or chemotherapy prior to surgery). **y-Prefix of pTNM (Variable number: 4.7)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.0, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children\' see [NICER](https://www.nicer.org/).

definition.value: TNM assigned during or after neoadjuvant therapy.
